name: Fun Race 3D: Run Traffic Turn
description:
To play:

1. Jump once or double-jump to try to land on players heads
They will be crushed and you will gain a small but significant boost

2. Use your booster at the bottom left of your screen to throw yourself at unsuspecting players, and make them fall behind

Once first in your league you will rank up, racing against harder opponents

Simple mechanics, hours of fun !
